description: "Suffering Violence" and the Kingdom of Heaven (Mt. 11:12): A Matthean Manual for Life in a Time of War Glen Stassen, Fuller Theological Seminary Transforming Initiatives of Just Peacemaking Based on the Triadic Structure of the Sermon on the Mount
title: "Suffering Violence" and the Kingdom of Heaven (Mt. 11:12): A Matthean Manual for Life in a Time of War
